description.narrative: This activity (Stabilisation Programme Team) is a component of To increase security for Libyans with access to accountable justice through strengthening of the Ministry of Interior and the Police reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,529,140. This component benefits Libya, and works in the following sector(s): Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Crown Agents Limited, Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office. The start date is 18-07-2011 and the end date is 31-07-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
